name: hover_card
docstring: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

properties.name: HoverCardRoot.default_open
properties.docstring: The open state of the hover card when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

properties.name: HoverCardRoot.open
properties.docstring: The controlled open state of the hover card. Must be used in conjunction with onOpenChange.

properties.name: HoverCardRoot.open_delay
properties.docstring: The duration from when the mouse enters the trigger until the hover card opens.

properties.name: HoverCardRoot.close_delay
properties.docstring: The duration from when the mouse leaves the trigger until the hover card closes.

properties.name: HoverCardContent.side
properties.docstring: The preferred side of the trigger to render against when open. Will be reversed when collisions occur and avoidCollisions is enabled.

properties.name: HoverCardContent.side_offset
properties.docstring: The distance in pixels from the trigger.

properties.name: HoverCardContent.align
properties.docstring: The preferred alignment against the trigger. May change when collisions occur.

properties.name: HoverCardContent.align_offset
properties.docstring: An offset in pixels from the "start" or "end" alignment options.

properties.name: HoverCardContent.avoid_collisions
properties.docstring: Whether or not the hover card should avoid collisions with its trigger.

properties.name: HoverCardContent.collision_padding
properties.docstring: The distance in pixels from the boundary edges where collision detection should occur. Accepts a number (same for all sides), or a partial padding object, for example: { top: 20, left: 20 }.

properties.name: HoverCardContent.sticky
properties.docstring: The sticky behavior on the align axis. "partial" will keep the content in the boundary as long as the trigger is at least partially in the boundary whilst "always" will keep the content in the boundary regardless

properties.name: HoverCardContent.hide_when_detached
properties.docstring: Whether to hide the content when the trigger becomes fully occluded.

events.name: HoverCardRoot.on_open_change
events.docstring: Fired when the open state changes.
